original: @#/_/mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon
analyzed: @#/_/mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon
translated: The Guru Who Removes Obstacles to the Protector

original: po'i gegs sel bla ma🔽gnad sgyur/ sa🔽\u0f7c_phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las mi bskyod pa la brten nas bgegs
analyzed: po'i gegs sel bla ma gnad sgyur/ sa \u0f7c_phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las mi bskyod pa la brten nas bgegs
translated: Based on Akṣobhya🔽The Six Dharmas of Jñānanātha: The Method for Removing Obstacles Based on Akṣobhya

original: sel thabs bzhugs so/_/_@##/_/gu ru na mo/_mi bskyod pa'i bgegs sel
analyzed: sel thabs bzhugs so/_/_@##/_/gu ru na mo/_mi bskyod pa'i bgegs sel
translated: The Removal of Obstacles of Akṣobhya

original: 'di la/_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du song nas/_rang yi dam gang byed du
analyzed: 'di la/_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du song nas/_rang yi dam gang byed du
translated: For this, having gone for refuge and generated bodhicitta beforehand, meditate on whatever yidam you practice.

original: bsgoms la/_mdun du gzhal yas khang pad+ma 'dab bzhi/_'khyams phyogs mtshhon/
analyzed: bsgoms la/_mdun du gzhal yas khang pad+ma 'dab bzhi/_'khyams phyogs mtshhon/
translated: In front of oneself, there is a four-petaled lotus with a celestial palace, the courtyard in the cardinal and intermediate directions,

original: phyi rdor ra dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba/_pad+ma'i lte bar rin po che'i khri phun sum
analyzed: phyi rdor ra dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba/_pad+ma'i lte bar rin po che'i khri phun sum
translated: and outside, a vajra fence surrounded by the eight charnel grounds. In the center of the lotus, there is a precious throne with all the perfect qualities.

original: tshhogs pa/_de'i steng du skad cig gis mi bskyod pa sku mdog ser po zhal gcig
analyzed: tshhogs pa/_de'i steng du skad cig gis mi bskyod pa sku mdog ser po zhal gcig
translated: Upon that, Akṣobhya instantly appears with a yellow-colored body, one face,

original: phyag gnyis pa/_g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu bsnams pa/_dbu la rigs lngas
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa/_g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu bsnams pa/_dbu la rigs lngas
translated: and two hands, holding a vajra in the right hand and a bell in the left hand. The head is marked with the five families.

original: mtshhan pa/_sku gzi mdangs bkrag dang ldan pa/_thugs byin brlabs dang ldan pa/
analyzed: mtshhan pa/_sku gzi mdangs bkrag dang ldan pa/_thugs byin brlabs dang ldan pa/
translated: The body is endowed with brilliance and radiance. The mind is endowed with blessings.

original: zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa/_de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/_'og min stug po
analyzed: zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa/_de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/_'og min stug po
translated: He has a smiling expression.🔽Light radiates from his heart, invoking the mandala of deities from the heart of the guru above my head.🔽

original: bkod pa nas/_rdo rje 'chang dang bla ma rnams spyan drangs/_mi bskyod pa la bstim/
analyzed: bkod pa nas/_rdo rje 'chang dang bla ma rnams spyan drangs/_mi bskyod pa la bstim/
translated: His face is smiling. Light radiates from his heart, inviting Vajradhara and the gurus from the Dense Array buddhafield of Akaniṣṭha, who dissolve into Akṣobhya.

original: mchod pa bzhi rdzogs su phul/_gsol ba gdab/_bshags pa bya/_bla ma'i thugs
analyzed: mchod pa bzhi rdzogs su phul/_gsol ba gdab/_bshags pa bya/_bla ma'i thugs
translated: Make the four complete offerings and supplicate. Do the confession.

original: kar pad ma dkar po gcig bsam/_de'i lte bar hri dmar ser gcig bsam/
analyzed: kar pad ma dkar po gcig bsam/_de'i lte bar hri dmar ser gcig bsam/
translated: In the guru’s heart, imagine a white lotus with an orange hrīḥ in its center.

original: de'i mtha' mar gu ru hri ces pa'i yig 'bru ser pos 'khor ba la dmigs pa
analyzed: de'i mtha' mar gu ru hri ces pa'i yig 'bru ser pos 'khor ba la dmigs pa
translated: Around the edge of that, imagine the yellow syllables gu ru hri, focusing on that.🔽Do the recitation and supplication.

original: gtad la bzlas pa bya/_gsol ba gdab po/_/slob ma gzhug pa ni/_sngon 'gro
analyzed: gtad la bzlas pa bya/_gsol ba gdab po/_/slob ma gzhug pa ni/_sngon 'gro
translated: For the disciples’ entrance, the preliminaries are the same as before.

original: gzhan dang 'dra/_man+dal dbus su bla ma gsal gdab slob ma'i spyi bor byon par
analyzed: gzhan dang 'dra/_man+dal dbus su bla ma gsal gdab slob ma'i spyi bor byon par
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala, visualize the guru and imagine that he arrives above the disciples’ head.

original: bsam/_slob ma'i gnas gsum du yi ge gsum bsam/_de nas dpral bar om
analyzed: bsam/_slob ma'i gnas gsum du yi ge gsum bsam/_de nas dpral bar om
translated: In the disciples’ three places, imagine the three syllables.🔽Then, from the white oṃ in the forehead,

original: dkar po las/_bdud rtshi dkar po byung /_slob ma'i spyi bor babs/_bum
analyzed: dkar po las/_bdud rtshi dkar po byung /_slob ma'i spyi bor babs/_bum
translated: white poison arises and falls on the disciples’ heads.

original: dbang thob 'dre/_mgrin pa'i _mgrin par gsang dbang /_thugs ka'i hum
analyzed: dbang thob 'dre/_mgrin pa'i _mgrin par gsang dbang /_thugs ka'i hum
translated: Imagine that you have received the secret empowerment.

original: ser po las 'od zer bde ba'i rang bzhin ser po babs/_snying gar shes rab ye🔽shes/_bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge dkar dmar mthing gsum las/_bdud rtshi
analyzed: ser po las 'od zer bde ba'i rang bzhin ser po babs/_snying gar shes rab ye shes/_bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge dkar dmar mthing gsum las/_bdud rtshi
translated: From the yellow hūṃ in the guru’s throat, yellow light rays with the nature of bliss descend and enter your heart.🔽Imagine that you have received the wisdom-awareness empowerment.

original: dkar dmar gsum byung /_slob ma'i dbu ma'i nang nas mar zhugs/_lte bar
analyzed: dkar dmar gsum byung /_slob ma'i dbu ma'i nang nas mar zhugs/_lte bar
translated: From the white, red, and blue letters in the guru’s three places, white, red, and blue vital drops emerge and enter your central channel.🔽They arrive at your navel. Imagine that you have received the fourth empowerment.

original: sleb dbang bzhi pa thob/_rtsha mig thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis gang /
analyzed: sleb dbang bzhi pa thob/_rtsha mig thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis gang /
translated: All the vital drops are filled with the nature of bliss.🔽Introduce [the disciples] to bliss and emptiness.

original: bde stong du ngo sprad dbang gi rgyal po rang gi spyi bo na mar zhugs/_rang lus skad
analyzed: bde stong du ngo sprad dbang gi rgyal po rang gi spyi bo na mar zhugs/_rang lus skad
translated: The king of empowerments descends from the crown of your head and enters your body.🔽In an instant you arise as Protector.

original: cig gis mgon por bskyed/_de'i thugs kar/_shes pa 'phyo na bla ma ser por🔽bsgom/_yid mi dga' zhing 'phyo na bla ma dmar por bsgom/_khams 'dus
analyzed: cig gis mgon por bskyed/_de'i thugs kar/_shes pa 'phyo na bla ma ser por bsgom/_yid mi dga' zhing 'phyo na bla ma dmar por bsgom/_khams 'dus
translated: If your mind is agitated, meditate on the guru as yellow.🔽If your mind is unhappy and agitated, meditate on the guru as red.

original: langs shing /_dgongs phyogs bsdod snying mi 'dod pa byung na/_sku mdog sngon
analyzed: langs shing /_dgongs phyogs bsdod snying mi 'dod pa byung na/_sku mdog sngon
translated: If you feel like getting up and don’t want to stay in the meditation posture, meditate on the guru as blue.

original: ba'i dus lha sku mi gsal bar gyur na/_nam phyed kyi dus su thun zhabs thams cad🔽la/_bla ma'i thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros/_'gro ba sems can thams cad 'od🔽du zhu bar bsam/_stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du nyams su blangs/_rang lus🔽lha sku snang stong du nyams su blang /_thun mgo thams cad du bla ma la gsol ba🔽mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i gegs sel bla ma gnad sgyur/🔽'debs pa gal che/_rdzogs rim ni mgon po'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge bla mar bsdu/🔽rang lus bla mar gsal bar sgom/_bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge thugs ka'i hum la
analyzed: ba'i dus lha sku mi gsal bar gyur na/_nam phyed kyi dus su thun zhabs thams cad🔽la/_bla ma'i thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros/_'gro ba sems can thams cad 'od🔽du zhu bar bsam/_stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du nyams su blangs/_rang lus🔽lha sku snang stong du nyams su blang /_thun mgo thams cad du bla ma la gsol ba🔽mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i gegs sel bla ma gnad sgyur/🔽'debs pa gal che/_rdzogs rim ni mgon po'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge bla mar bsdu/🔽rang lus bla mar gsal bar sgom/_bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge thugs ka'i hum la
translated: It is important to visualize the supplication.

original: bsdu/_hum na da la thim/_na da thig le la/_thig le stong pa nyid la thim/_sems
analyzed: bsdu/_hum na da la thim/_na da thig le la/_thig le stong pa nyid la thim/_sems
translated: The bindu dissolves into emptiness.🔽Rest in the state of nonmodification.

original: ma bcos pa'i ngang la bzhag_/gsal stong dang bla ma dbyer mi phyed par sgom/
analyzed: ma bcos pa'i ngang la bzhag_/gsal stong dang bla ma dbyer mi phyed par sgom/
translated: Meditate inseparably with the clarity-emptiness guru.🔽 Dedicate the virtue and recite the auspicious verses.

original: bsngo ba bya/_bkra shis brjod/_mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i gegs sel
analyzed: bsngo ba bya/_bkra shis brjod/_mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i gegs sel
translated: Removing Obstacles of the Protector Based on Akṣobhya🔽Guru’s Vital Points

original: bla ma gnad sgyur/_dpal ldan sha wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bla ma gnad sgyur/_dpal ldan sha wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of Śrī Śavaripa is complete.

original: mgon po'i bka' gang byed kyang gser gyi man+dal shin tu gal
analyzed: mgon po'i bka' gang byed kyang gser gyi man+dal shin tu gal
translated: No matter what command of the protector you perform, a golden maṇḍala is very important.
